name: BLOCKS (itch) (Uttam Kushwah)
description:
Help this simplistic looking blocks to escape the each levels by helping one of them to get to the teleportation switch(The Green Ball). 

Controls:

Click any single block to control it as in Third Person View.

W - Forward

S - Backward

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Press Tab to exit Third Person View and select other boxes to Control. 

I know that there is nothing, other than the game-play itself in it, I mean I didn't even describe the controls and what needs to be done in order to win in game itself, but I am just desperate to upload it. It gives me the sense I am making progress.
